documents.document:
A very key feature on your DVR

A very important feature of the Digital Video Recorder is without a doubt motion activated recording. If the Digital Video Recorder spy camera is situated in an area under surveillance there are more often than not many uneventful hours of inactivity. A hidden camera is really there to video a few brief moments of criminal or suspect behavior. Motion activation allows you to gather evidence only when there is activity in the area you are interested in. A motion detector allows you to prevent scrolling through long hours of dead video plus, gives you a convenient date stamp for the piece of video recorded. The average DVR hidden cameraunits contain motion activated recording which can be easily control from the main menu. As well as motion detection recording you should have the option to videotape manually by clicking a button on your remote control unit or the choice to program scheduled recording at a preset time.

Another conventional and vitally important function you want in any Digital Video Recorder spy camera is an automatic time & date tag which gives you a clear record of exactly when the surveillance footage was recorded. Usually spy cameras with a built in DVR have an automated time and date stamp that is simple to set up from the main menu. The reason for wanting an automatic time & date stamp is obvious to most people. If you are planning to use the camera’s footage you have recorded for evidence against a person you must know the time the event occurred.

Hidden cameras containing a built in Digital Video Recorders use memory cards to store its video files. SD cards serve as a miniature hard drive you can easily removable from the hidden camera unit and can be played back on your PC or laptop. Memory cards are commonly used with digital cameras and video recorders. If you do not have the slot to put in an SD card then you will have to get a USB adapter.

Spy cameras with built inDVR units should also come with RCA style audio and video plugs so that you can review your video on a simple TV monitor.

Spy cameras with built in DVRs are a simpler alternative to bulky wires or difficult wireless receiver transmitter set ups. Stringing video wires is often not only hard to do but impossible considering the sort of circumstances where a hidden camera is required. Wireless transmission of your surveillance video signal is often highly tricky to set up. With a DVR you have no wireless transmissons to contentd with or any complex set up to understand. The hidden cameras themselves come in a variety of different shapes and sizes ingeniously concealed inside everyday items like clocks, radios, or even electrical outlets. Here is an example: Spy Camera DVR SD Card

If you need to monitor a babysitter, a troublesome employee, or a restricted area a secret camera with a DVR is usually a good solution at a price you can afford. All you need to do is set the unit up and thenat the end of the day pop out the memory card from your camera insert it into your PC and you have all the action on video.

Surveillance technology has advanced over the past decade and now effective security items are available to the average person at reasonable prices. This democratization of technology makes it possible for you to provide affordable safety and security with professional grade equipment and excellent results.

Your spy camera is only there to catch a few fleeting moments of unlawful or suspicious behavior. Motion activation allows you to take video only when there is action in the location you are interested in. A motion detector lets you to avoid scrolling through countless hours of dead footage plus, supplies a handy time stamp for the piece of video filmed. Nearly all DVR spy cameras incorporate motion activated recording which can be easily control from the main menu. In addition to motion detection recording you will have an option to capture video manually at the push of a button on a remote control unit or the option to program scheduled taping at a preset period.

A second regular and yet most important feature you need in a Digital Video Recorder hidden camera is an automatic time & date stamp which gives you a clear record of exactly when the video footage was taken. Spy cameras that include a built in Digital Video Recorders use memory cards to store its video files. Hidden cameras with dedicatedDigital Video Recorder units should also provide RCA type audio and video plugs so that you can manage your video on a common TV monitor.

Spy cameras with built in DVRs are a simpler alternative to working with wires or difficult wireless receiver transmitter devices. If you wish to monitor a nanny, a suspicious employee, or an off limits area a covert camera with a Digital Video Recorder is usually a good solution at a price you can afford. Surveillance expertise has improved over the recent decade and now effective security products are available to the average person at low prices. This growth of technology makes it possible for you to provide quality safety and security with professional grade equipment and professional results.

How to pick your spy camera

How to pick the right hidden camera. What is the main purpose of this spy camera? Where will the secret cameras be situated? Do you have to record video to review at a later time? Do you want a wireless camera?

What is the primary goal of this covert camera?

Here are several typical objectives:
* Identify a burglar in an office or store
* Protect your family with spy cameras for home use
* Insure the Kids are taken care of by the Nanny with a camera
* Discover if a husband is commiting adultery with spy for your home
* Set up camera systems for your office

Where can the secret cameras be situated?
* Will you be able to string a connecting wire leading from the hidden house cameras to a monitor?
* How will you get electrical power to the camera? They all must have power to operate.
* What kind of thing might fit in to the room and not arouse suspicion?
* Which are the most effective nanny cameras for home use?
* Where can you install a covert nanny cam without getting in trouble?
* Are your cctv cameras for your home or outdoor recording?
* What about the lighting in the area? Black & white cameras work better for low light.
* Are you putting in one covert camera or several hidden security camera systems?

Do you need to record events to view later?
* What duration will you want to record?
* What level of action is there in the space? Spy cameras for home use record less action than a store modelcamera.
* Will you want spy cameras or continuously recording cameras?
* Do you need hidden camera motion activated recording or scheduled? or both?

Do you require a wireless camera?
* Find out if you have a cord free phone or wifi network that might interfere with your a wireless signal?
* Do you desire to watch the video feed live from somewhere else?
* Are you certain you can not run a wire to view or possibly use a built in recorder to avoid interference with wireless feeds.

What are my options?
1. Wired - a camera connected with a video wire to a recording device - best with covert cameras for home or businesses needs
2. Wireless- a camera with a wireless transmitter that can send the video with no wires to a close by (hidden) receiver hooked up with a short wire to the video recorder or TV for live monitoring
3. Spy Cam - A camera with a dedicated DVR that records video directly to a Secure Digital Memory card. Such as: Wind Tunnel Hidden Camera With DVR and 8Gb SD-Card
One final note typically users ask us… Why can't I use spy audio? The simple answer is that audio recording violates federal law and you could go to jail if you secretly record audio.

Pepper Gels or Pepper Foam - Which is Better?

Pepper Gels generally increase the range and provide more accurate aiming than the basic aerosol units. Additionally, pepper gels offer stronger pepper solutions and the foam or gel sticks to your assailants face for maximum effect.

Pepper Spray Foggers
Pepper sprays that dispersed with an aerosol method creates a cloud of pepper spray which is why it is called a fogger. The main advantages of this method are you are not required to be as accurate when you aim. Plus, you will take in a wider area… or multiple targets with a single spray. The disadvantages are that if you are on the move or in a windy spot the cloud of spray might come back towards you. Also a dispersed cloud may not pack as powerful a punch as focused stream of pepper gel or pepper foam.

Pepper Spray Rules & Best Practices

At one time, pepper spray was not a well known thing. These days it comes up as a subject for conversation at every turn.How much do you know?

Mace Pepper Spray provides an powerful, non-lethal way of protecting yourself from a possible attacker. When you need to spray pepper spray it is not lethal but it does hurt.

If you require info about legal issues you should talk to your local police to know what isthe law in your state. Just be aware that people are not allowed to simply shot pepper spray at a person without a cause.

Mace Pepper sprays can be found in several different varieties, many are compact enough to hide in a handbag or pocket. Whether you pick a heavy duty spray canister or a miniature spray bottle that fits on your key ring, it’s important you use pepper spray correctly and follow a few basic guidelines:

Review your states law about pepper spray. A few states only allow specific sizes and concentrations, there are states that prohibit Internet sales of pepper spray – know the rules prior to making a purchase.

Keep your mace pepper sprays always in the same location. You need to be able to get you hands on the pepper spray as soon as you need your pepper spray – in a crisis situation, you don’t have time to dig around in your bag to find your pepper spray.

Test it periodically. It's a good idea to (carefully) test your pepper spray so you know it still works. It’s also good practice so you are ready to use it if you need to.

Keep pepper spray out of the reach of children. Although it’s not lethal, pepper spray can be painful. Don’t leave it in a place where your kids can get at it.

Pepper Spray Laws
Here are pepper spray laws and restrictions that we are aware of. You should check locally if you believe pepper sprays may be restricted in your area. Read:
Pepper Spray Laws

Hidden Diversion Safes Are Highly Effective And Save You Mon

<img height="200" width="173" src="http://www.securityandselfdefensestore.com/images/stories/ProductDescription/wallclocksafe.jpg"; style="float: left; margin: 10px; border: 0pt none;"/> Often the best place to hide something is in plain sight. It's a well known fact that a thief takes only six minutes inside your home on average.

Crooks are aware that the longer they are present in your home the more likely they are to get spotted andcaught. Their haste leaves little time for a thorough hunt so thieves willonly target the most obvious places in their search for money or jewelry.

So, make time work in your favor, stash your treasures in plain view. Diversion safes provide a unique home security product which is low cost and highly effective. A diversion safe is a tiny price for powerful from loss by burglary. Keep valuables hidden where only you would ever look!

Many law enforcement experts believe diversion safes are often times better than a traditional locked safe, and a thousand times cheaper. Police will also tell you, cheap safes are more successful than expensive floor or wall safes.

Secret Diversion Safes Really Work And Save You Money

A good money safe doesn’t have to cost you a bundle. It just needs to be realistic enough blend in and avoid being noticed. And well crafted enough so that if anyone picks it up they will be tricked into thinking it is just a can.

All of our hidden home safes look exactly like the real product or container in every way. This is because each diversion safe is re-manufactured from an original container. Our diversion safes are indistinguishable from the real product, plus they, are weighted to feel full. All of our can safes come with seamless screw-off top or bottom, to allow a secret compartments in an inner recess within the can or container.

Your stuff can thenbe inconspicuously stashed inside these fake containers and kept in your kitchen, bathroom, garage or car.

Hidden Diversion Safes Are Highly Effective And Are Low Cost

Book safes are a time honored way for guarding your treasures the key to a safe, a private document, a flask, a gun. Plus you can utilize them while out of town to hide and ipod, back up cash, or other valuables from would-be theft. And of courseif you end up wrongfully imprisoned, they are an awesome place to stash a rock hammer for tunneling to escape

In addition to being fun to play with, book safes also are a novel, interesting gift. If money is tight this year, why not make a few book safes to give to friends and family. The supplies that you require costs only a few dollars, and each will take youa mere 2.5 hours or so tomake.

Plus one can use book safes if out of town to hide and ipod, back up cash, and other valuables from possible theft.
